channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Chatsworth Road at various locations all the way down to Christchurch ave, 28th December
item.description:
Metal frame:large sheet of glass x2: toilet bowl: bed frame: builders rubbish has been at corner Coverdale and Willesden lane for months.rubbish truly shocking.OK it’s Christmas but …. All down Chatsworth road

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapesbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Westmoreland Rd - Litter, 28th December
item.description:
Full length of Westmoreland Road needs attention for litter - on pavement, hedge/fence lines, verges, gutters etc. Please can road be cleaned as looking untidy and unwelcoming currently, it would be appreciated if request could be completed properly the first time of asking. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmoreland Road, Park Langley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter bin full and overflowing, 28th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmoreland Road, Park Langley, Greater London

item.title: Excessively bright street lighting, 28th December
item.description:
Two Exceptionally bright Spotlights on building (corner of layard Rd Fenner Pl.). These shine directly into windows at back of properties on Banyard Road. Who owns this building? These lights are brighter than all other lights locally, are pointed horizontal and not shielded. Please look into this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog mess bin is overflowing!!!!, 28th December
item.description:
The dog mess bin has been overflowing for months , it is hardly ever emptied and is overflowing and all around the bottom of the lamppost , I reported it to the caretaker who said it was reported but not his job and it is now getting worse , please can it be emptied regularly!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanbury Road, Nunhead, Greater London

item.title: Continual rubbish and drug paraphernalia, 28th December
item.description:
Every night people park up and throw food needles and other drug paraphernalia out of the car. Has been ongoing for over a year: This is right opposite the nursery entrance to Seabright School. We need a regular cleaning service here.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Audrey Street, Hackney, London
